name: Sound Dash - a Great Endless Runner Game
name_original: Sound Dash - a Great Endless Runner Game
description: Dash and rush your way through a delightful new selection of sensuous tunnels. Challenge yourself to go further by collecting magic orbs. Collect two in a row for a special slo-motion challenge. Hang on for a joy ride that is sure to please and surf yourself through endless tunnels of arcade action.   Sound dash is a new free game suitable for all ages, kids through adults.
